unnormalised: Hey everyone, return policies, right? Like, imagine buying a saree for Onam from Chandni Chowk and it doesn't fit! Hassle, yaar! I once returned a pressure cooker to Flipkart after making disastrous biryani. Good thing they took it back. What are your experiences? Easy or tension-wala situation?
